original_text: And the rest of the Jews acted hypocritically along with him, so that even Barnabas was led astray by their hypocrisy.
korean_text: 남은 유대인들도 그와 같이 외식하므로 바나바도 그들의 외식에 유혹되었느니라

sentences.original_text: And the rest of the Jews acted hypocritically along with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 유대인들도 그와 함께 외식하였습니다

sentences.original_text: so that even Barnabas was led astray by their hypocrisy
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 바나바마저도 그들의 외식 때문에 미혹되었습니다
